thought: To craft a green_stained_glass_pane, I need to first craft green_stained_glass. This requires placing 1 glass_pane and 1 green_dye in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the green_stained_glass from slot 34 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 1 with quantity 1
